notes:
Update: Cinematic Cut-ins v1.1.5

‚ú® New Features
- Midi-QOL Integration: Added dedicated global triggers (On Attack, On Damage, On Critical) for D&D 5e actors. These options appear only when Midi-QOL is active.
- Global Style Triggers: Triggers can now be saved in Global Styles. When importing to an Actor, you can choose to Style Only, Append, or Replace triggers.
- Enhanced Analysis: Expanded text detection scope to include item names and merged content for better keyword recognition.
- Monk's Common Display Support: Fixed compatibility issues where the overlay was hidden in spectator mode.

üêõ Bug Fixes
- Playback Duplication: Fixed a critical issue where cut-ins triggered multiple times due to user permission conflicts (Resources, Combat, Chat).
